  Kit:

    - snare:     test/sounds/snare_mono_8.wav

    - Verse:  x2
    - Chorus: x2

Verse:
  - [bass, [hh_closed]]:  X...X...
  - snare:              ..X...X.
Chorus:

  - [snare, [bass, hh_closed]]: .X.X.X.X
